did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Dept. of Employment Dispute Resolution Agency Head Correspondence and Subject Files, 1980-2012

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Privacy protected and other protected information is considered confidential and restricted from public access for 75 years (Code of Virginia 42.1-78). Types of information that may be restricted include but are not limited to: Personal information (2.2-3801); Personnel records (2.2-3705.1; Grievability and compliance ruling files - Administrative investigations (2.2-3705.3). It is necessary for an archivist to review any unprocessed, modern record collections (those collections less than 75 years old) that may contain privacy protected or confidential information before the records can be used by patrons for research purposes or before any copies can be made. If you are planning to use these records, please contact Archives Reference Services for more details before planning your research trip.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia. Dept. of Employment Dispute Resolution. Agency head correspondence and subject files, [cite specific date and accession used]. State records collection, The Library of Virginia, Archives Branch, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 33519 transferred by Dept. of Employment Dispute Resolution, 31 August 1989.
Accession 36360 transferred by Dept. of Employment Dispute Resolution, 19 February 1999.
Accession 43552 transferred by Dept. of Employment Dispute Resolution, 03 December 2007.
Accession 44014 transferred by Dept. of Employment Dispute Resolution, 17 November 2008.
Accession 50472 transferred by Dept. of Employment Dispute Resolution, 25 June 2012.
Accession 51872 transferred by Dept. of Human Resource Management, 15 July 2016.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection has been processed using minimal standards: the original arrangement has been maintained, the container list is brief and simple, and the records have not been refoldered and fasteners have not been removed.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Dept. of Employment Dispute Resolution was created by an act which passed the General Assembly on 10 March 1978 coinciding with the establishment of a new grievance procedure for state employees.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These records consist of agency head correspondence, and may include reports and copies of grievability rulings. These files document the planning, direction, and implementation of agency programs and are evidence of actions and policy decisions.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into one series: Agency head correspondence and subject files, 1980-2012.

did.unittitle: Agency head correspondence and subject files, 1980-2006.

arrangement.p: This accession is contained within one box, possessing 24 folders arranged chronologically by month.
This accession is arranged in chronological order.
This accession is arranged according to subject, with no clear alphabetical or chronological order.
